name: Stardew Valley
author: games@metrogamelab.com
description: You've inherited your grandfather's old farm plot in Stardew Valley. Armed with hand-me-down tools and a few coins, you set out to begin your new life. Can you learn to live off the land and turn these overgrown fields into a thriving home?

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# If game isn't installed, set it up.
if [[ ! -d ${HOME}/Stardew\ Valley/ ]]; then
cd ${HOME}/steamcmd 
mkdir -p ${HOME}/Stardew\ Valley/
./steamcmd.sh +login ${STEAM_USER} ${STEAM_PASS} ${STEAM_AUTH} +force_install_dir ${HOME}/Stardew\ Valley/ +app_update ${SRCDS_APPID} validate +quit
mkdir -p ${HOME}/.steam/sdk32
cp -v linux32/steamclient.so ../.steam/sdk32/steamclient.so
mkdir -p ${HOME}/.steam/sdk64
cp -v linux64/steamclient.so ../.steam/sdk64/steamclient.so
mkdir -p ${HOME}/nexus
wget https://github.com/Pathoschild/SMAPI/releases/download/3.8/SMAPI-3.8.0-installer.zip -qO ${HOME}/nexus.zip
unzip ${HOME}/nexus.zip -d ${HOME}/nexus/
/bin/bash -c "echo -e \"2\n${HOME}/Stardew\ Valley\n1\n\" | /usr/bin/mono ${HOME}/nexus/SMAPI\ 3.8.0\ installer/internal/unix-install.exe"
wget https://github.com/metrogamelab/stardew-valley-mods/raw/main/alwayson.zip -qO ${HOME}/alwayson.zip
wget https://github.com/metrogamelab/stardew-valley-mods/raw/main/unlimitedplayers.zip -qO ${HOME}/unlimitedplayers.zip
wget https://github.com/metrogamelab/stardew-valley-mods/raw/main/autoloadgame.zip -qO ${HOME}/autoloadgame.zip
unzip ${HOME}/alwayson.zip -d ${HOME}/Stardew\ Valley/Mods
unzip ${HOME}/unlimitedplayers.zip -d ${HOME}/Stardew\ Valley/Mods
unzip ${HOME}/autoloadgame.zip -d ${HOME}/Stardew\ Valley/Mods
rm ${HOME}/alwayson.zip ${HOME}/unlimitedplayers.zip ${HOME}/autoloadgame.zip
chown -R ${USER}:${USER} ${HOME}
fi
